name: hv_exit_reason_t
desc: The type that describes the event that triggered a guest exit to the host.

items.name: var rawValue: UInt32
items.desc: The unsigned 32-bit integer that represents virual macine exit reasons.

items.name: init(UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a new exit reason instance with the value you provide.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a new exit reason instance with the value you provide.

items.name: var HV_EXIT_REASON_CANCELED: hv_exit_reason_t
items.desc: The value that identifies exits requested by exit handler on the host.

items.name: var HV_EXIT_REASON_EXCEPTION: hv_exit_reason_t
items.desc: The value that identifies traps caused by the guest operations.

items.name: var HV_EXIT_REASON_VTIMER_ACTIVATED: hv_exit_reason_t
items.desc: The value that identifies when the virtual timer enters the pending state.

items.name: var HV_EXIT_REASON_UNKNOWN: hv_exit_reason_t
items.desc: The value that identifies unexpected exits.
